oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WHN Guest Disc Jockey - Olivia Newton-John - 1977-11-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from Olivia Newton-John's (musician) performance as disc jockey for WHN Studios. The performance was on November 18, 1977. The tape was created by the WHN radio network.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Olivia Newton-John
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Unidentified intro jingle [featuring unidentified voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (00:09) Olivia Newton-John introduces the WHN radio show -- (00:17) Long Way From Memphis (Merle Haggard) -- (02:38) Newton-John introduces "Please Mr. Please" -- (02:52) Please Mr. Please (Olivia Newton-John) -- (06:10) Newton-John performs a weather report -- (06:34) Wool Bureau commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (07:02) Iberia Airlines commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (08:05) Derio Oldsmobile commercial spot hosted by Newton-John -- (09:00) Savings Banks commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (09:30) Newton-John introduces Larry Gatlin -- (09:36) Love is Just a Game (Larry Gatlin) -- (13:06) Don't Stop Believin' (Olivia Newton-John) -- (16:15) Newton-John invites the audience to call in; additionally, Newton-John performs a He-Man commercial spot -- (17:10) Metropolitan Life tune [featuring voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (18:11) I'm Knee Deep in Lovin' You (Dave and Sugar) -- (20:42) Newton-John praises Dave and Sugar and reflects on her promotional trip -- (21:18) Have You Ever Been Mellow (Olivia Newton-John) -- (24:33) Newton-John performs a Goods Super Sale [unconfirmed] commercial spot -- (25:33) Hankel commercial spot hosted by Otto Hankel -- (26:32) How Can I Leave You Again [excerpt] [featuring Newton-John and unidentified voiceover] (John Denver) -- (27:37) WHN commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (28:11) Newton-John -- (28:21) Don't Let Me Touch You (Marty Robbins) -- (31:07) Newton-John invites people to phone in -- (31:36) If You Love Me Let Me Know (Olivia Newton-John) -- (34:37) Gimble's Warehouse commercial spot hosted by Newton-John -- (35:25) Park's Sausage commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (35:35) Heineken jingle [featuring unidentified voiceover] ([unidentified]) -- (36:05) Banker's Trust commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (37:05) Newton-John and an unidentified voice talk via the phone -- (37:30) Come a Little Bit Closer (Johnny Duncan and Janie Fricke) -- (40:45) Let it Shine (Olivia Newton-John) -- (43:05) Newton-John reflects on being in Nashville recently and Christmas -- (43:47) Ford commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (44:47) Generic Prescription Drug commercial spot hosted by Newton-John -- (45:37) Castro commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (46:46) I Got the Hoss (Mel Tillis) -- (49:36) Wilabee's [unconfirmed] commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (50:35) John Conlee performs a radio spot of the current state of the Middle East -- (52:10) Lem Stone reflects on the state of Israel -- (53:12) Conlee finishes the international report -- (53:26) Ann Compton discusses the state of the White House's relationship with Israel -- (54:05) American Airlines commercial spot hosted by Conlee -- (55:11) Conlee performs a current state of the nation report -- (55:57) Patricia Harris reflects on the Urban Response policies, and Conlee performs a weather report -- (57:28) Newton-John says goodbye to the audience -- (57:46) I Honestly Love You (Olivia Newton-John)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Newton-John, Olivia;
